items.sentence: What can be said about it that hasn't been said before?
I wonder whether I should tell Tom about what happened.
What's something you eat every day or almost every day?
I had no idea that Tom didn't know how to speak French.
I had no idea that there was a bank so near your house.
I hope that somebody's there to unlock the door for us.
I hope that you were kidding about leaving at midnight.
If you don't have other plans, let's go out for dinner.
Please get out of the way so this lady can get through.
Tom was caught in the rain and his new suit got ruined.
